Si vis pacem, para bellum - If you want peace, prepare for war
The purpose of this mod is adding more weapon for the base HSK Aside from that, I just feels weid that some ammo type is just available for a single weapon, not so good for production chain, variety and logistic, I just want to fill those gaps first before adding anything else.
Updated: Now add custom weapons, explosives and turrets, any suggestion is always welcome!(Also for any feedback and bug report)
Sorry that I don't speak russian, also I am not a native English speaker, so you are free to correct any typo I made and anyone is free to translate my mod to any other language if you want.
